stimulusHtml: Which of the following concepts did Daniel use to create this work of art?

features.html:
Daniel is a psychology and art double major in college. He created a painting similar to the one in the image to produce a visual illusion for the audience.

Visual Illusion

  • The painting consists of 2 large adjoining squares.
  • The large squares are different shades of gray.
  • Each large square has a small square inside it.
  • The small squares are the same shade of gray but appear visually to be different shades.
